name: 2022 The 5th International Conference on Smart Grid and Energy
content: Proceedings: All accepted papers of ICSGE2022 will be collected in the conference proceedings, which is indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc. ☆☆Special Issue☆☆ Registered and chosen paper will be the publication in Special Issue in Energies (ISSN 1996-1073; CODEN: ENERGA). the journal has been indexed by the Science Citation Index Expanded (Web of Science), Ei Compendex, Scopus and other databases.
